title: Symptom Checker Chatbot
description: Created a real-time symptom checker chatbot using LLaMA and Groq API, deployed via Streamlit.

title: ToDo List (MERN Stack)
description: Built a ToDo List app with CRUD operations using the MERN stack, deployed via Netlify (frontend) and Render (backend).

title: Vehicle Count Prediction
description: Developed a YOLO-based vehicle count prediction system for real-time object detection and traffic monitoring.
